title: Out of the total permissible built up area on such plot, at least 2/3rd shall be allocated for Exhib
clause_text: Out of the total permissible built up area on such plot, at least 2/3rd shall be allocated for Exhibition-cum-Convention Centre buildings/ halls, toilet blocks, Organiser's office; protocol lounge; VIP lounge; Press lounge; registration areas; pre-function areas; refreshment & snack centres; meeting rooms; business centre; creche; meditation rooms; wellness centre; bank & forex service counters; surveillance & security rooms; service contractor's
section: 33 (22) Regulation for Exhibition-cum-Convention Centers in MCGM Area

source_pdf.text_snippet: Out of the total permissible built up area on such plot, at least 2/3rd shall be allocated for Exhibition-cum-Convention Centre buildings/ halls, toilet blocks, Organiser's office; protocol lounge; VI
